p:
End points in this study were evaluated according to the IWCLL criteria
28 and included: ORR, duration of response (DOR), PFS, OS and safety. In the analysis of PFS, time was calculated from the start date of first-line therapy to the date of progression or date of death, whichever came first. In the analysis of OS, time was calculated from the date of first-line therapy to the date of death. For event-free patients, time was calculated to the date of last clinical visit.
